name: Company of Heroes 2 - Whale and Dolphin Conservation Charity Pattern Pack
detailed_description:
All of the associated Relic / Sega revenue will be donated to the Whale and Dolphin Conservation charity.

Help protect endangered species and give your favorite COH2 factions a fresh new coat of paint! Relic teamed-up with modder Rita Rush to create those three unique sets inspired by whales, dolphins and orcas for the Oberkommando West, British Forces and US Forces. To learn more about WDC and how you can help, visit their website: http://uk.whales.org

short_description: Help protect endangered species and give your favorite COH2 factions a fresh new coat of paint! Relic teamed-up with modder Rita Rush to create those three unique sets inspired by whales, dolphins and orcas for the Oberkommando West, British Forces and US Forces.
supported_languages:
Czech, English*, French*, German*, Italian, Polish*, Russian*, Spanish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Graphics: 512MB Direct3D 10 capable video card (GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 2900XT)
  • OS: 32bit Vista
  • Internet: Broadband Internet connection
  • Hard Drive: 30GB free Hard disc space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4GB RAM
  • Processor: 3Ghz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent
  • Graphics: 1024 MB Direct3D 11 capable video card (GeForce GTX 470 or Radeon HD 5850)
  • OS: 64bit Windows 7 and above
  • Internet: Broadband Internet connection
  • Hard Drive: 30GB free Hard disc space
